oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Written in Maghribi script, in one column, 26 lines per page, in black rubricated in red..
According to the colophon (f. 197v), copy completed in Rabīʻ al-Thānī 1188 AH [June 1774 AD].
MS Arab 259. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
